***"What is 'Simple Long Term Investing'?"***

> Its exactly what it sounds like.
> 
> I will give you very clear and simple instructions on what to buy, and how to buy it.
> 
> This will be the fastest way for a beginner to form a portfolio.




***"What do I buy with Simple Long Term Investing Signals?"***

> You will be buying BTC and ETH.




***"Why should I use Simple Long Term Investing Signals when I can just buy my own crypto?"***

> Because you don't know when to buy, or when to sell.
> 
> We do.




***"How long does Simple Long Term Investing Signals last for?"***

> Impossible to know in advance. Possibly Years.




***"What if I already have a portfolio? How can Simple Long Term Investing Signals help me?"***

> You may 'think' you have a portfolio, but it's probably just a bag of trash.
> 
> The Simple Long Term Investing Signals is something that will make you money for sure.
> 
> Your portfolio is probably just a handful of lottery tickets. 




***"Ok, but if I use Simple Long Term Investing Signals, when will I know when to sell?"***

> We will tell you




***"The Simple Long Term Investing Signals look too basic, I need something that is 'more advanced' / 'works faster' / 'has more reward & risk'"***

> No problem, we have plenty of those strategies too. 
> 
> Do more lessons to unlock them.




***"How much will I make following Simple Long Term Investing Signals?"***

> Impossible to know because everyone buys at different times. Obviously.
> 
> Do you think I have telepathy?
> 
> You want me to just make up a random number don't you?
> 
> If you're unironically asking this question then its an indication that you're a danger to yourself and others because you know so little about investing.
> 
> Its ok, we am here to guide you because we are the best investors on earth.




***Where can I find it?:***

> In the ⭐｜Simple Long Term Investing channel.




***Want to create your own portfolio strategy so you know how to invest without me having to hold your hand like a child?***

> Do all the lessons and graduate the ***CRYPTO MASTERCLASS*** for a complete guide on how to make your own.




***What type of positions are we even getting into?***

> For this specific category we will be using spot positions.
